p: By the end of 2007, at least three separate introductions of different (sub)strains of H5N1 into Germany had been detected. 26 The chances are that more will occur. The question then becomes whether the existing protocols for infectious prevention and protection are enough. What is “enough” depends in turn on risk tolerance (see introduction), as well as on what is possible in terms of understanding and responding to H5N1 infection and its anticipated progress and prognosis.
